subject: World Baseball Classic
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Even when superstar pitchers decline invitations to play in the W.B.C., there are plenty of sturdy arms to go around for the United States. The same cannot be said for Venezuela.
snippet: Even when superstar pitchers decline invitations to play in the W.B.C., there are plenty of sturdy arms to go around for the United States. The same cannot be said for Venezuela.
